approach.phase1Description: Define scope, architecture, API contracts, and data flow. Choose stack deliberately: TypeScript, Node.js/NestJS, React/Next.js, PostgreSQL/MongoDB, and messaging where needed.
approach.phase2Description: Build features iteratively with code reviews and test coverage (unit/integration/e2e). Focus on reliability, clear ownership, and maintainable code that ships without regressions.
approach.phase3Description: Deploy through CI/CD using Docker and GitHub Actions. For mobile, deliver React Native apps with Expo/EAS (Build + OTA updates), manage env configs, and support production releases.
